short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop discounts on the Qantas Rewards Store without loyalty points

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop discounts of 5% - 10% on over +8000 products listed on the Qantas Rewards Store without a Qantas account or loyalty points.

Towster works by connecting your purchases to Sellers who use their loyalty points to fulfil your order.

Fill your Qantas cart then Click on the Towster button to Apply your Discounts. Checkout with Towster to have your order connected to a Towster Seller.

Help us keep Towster working on all your favorite stores. If you have any trouble, contact us via our Contact Us page - https://www.towster.co/contact-us/

We currently support shopping Qantas Rewards Store Australia but intend to integrate with more reward programs. See https://www.qantasstore.com.au/ for more information.

----------------------------------------------------

By using this add-on, you agree to the Towster Terms & Conditions available at https://www.towster.co/terms/

Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
